availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Spencer Berkley and Euphena Berkley. Married to Jennetta Berkley. Father of Harriet Berkley. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as private from August 16, 1862, to April 10, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 318B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 984.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0075.
